contentrichtext.text: '''''The Mirror''''' may refer to: In '''music''': * [[The Mirror (song)|"The Mirror" (song)]], a song by Dream Theater * [[The Mirror (Spooky Tooth album)|''The Mirror'' (Spooky Tooth album)]] * ''[[The Mirror: Reloaded]]'', an album by Ja Rule * [[The Mirror (band)]], a band that appeared on ''[[Beat-Club]]'' In '''film and television''':{{anchor|Film}} * [[The Mirror (1999 film)|''The Mirror'' (1999 film)]], a film by Agan * [[The Mirror (1997 film)|''The Mirror'' (1997 film)]], a film by Jafar Panahi * [[Aaina (1993 film)|''The Mirror'' (1993 film)]], a film by Deepak Sareen * [[The Mirror (1993 film II)|''The Mirror'' (1993 film II)]], a film by Sergiu Nicolaescu * [[The Mirror (1975 film)|''The Mirror'' (1975 film)]], a film by Andrei Tarkovsky * [[The Mirror (1974 film)|''The Mirror'' (1974 film)]], a film by Nazrul Islam * [[The Mirror (1967 film)|''The Mirror'' (1967 film)]], a film by Qin Tao * [[The Mirror (1913 film)|''The Mirror'' (1913 film)]], a film by Anthony O'Sullivan * [[The Mirror (The Twilight Zone)|"The Mirror" (''The Twilight Zone'')]], an episode of ''The Twilight Zone'' * [[The Mirror (2007 film)|''The Mirror'' (2007 film)]], a film starring [[Kelly LeBrock]] * [[The Mirror (2005 film)|''The Mirror'' (2005 film)]], a film starring [[Robert Sedgwick (actor)|Robert Sedgwick]] * [[The Mirror (1917 film)|''The Mirror'' (1917 film)]], a film starring [[Marjorie Rambeau]] * [[The Mirror (1914 film)|''The Mirror'' (1914 film)]], a film starring [[Charlotte Burton]] * [[The Mirror (1911 film)|''The Mirror'' (1911 film)]], a [[List of rediscovered films|rediscovered film]] In '''publications''': * ''[[Daily Mirror]]'', a UK tabloid newspaper * ''[[Montreal Mirror]]'', a Quebec alternative weekly * [[The Mirror (novel)|''The Mirror'' (novel)]], a 1978 horror novel by Marlys Millhiser * [[The Mirror (UNC newspaper)|''The Mirror'' (UNC newspaper)]], the student newspaper for the University of Northern Colorado * [[The Mirror (Pakistani magazine)|''The Mirror'' (Pakistani magazine)]] * ''The Mirror'', the campus newspaper of [[Lakeland College (Wisconsin)|Lakeland College]] * ''The Mirror'', the newspaper of [[William Penn Charter School]] * ''The Mirror'', a book by [[T.B. Joshua]] * ''The Mirror'', a novelette by [[Nancy Farmer (author)]] * "The Mirror", a short story by [[Eiko Kadono]] ==See also== * ''[[Der Spiegel]]'', a German newspaper * [[Mirror (disambiguation)]] * {{lookfrom|The Mirror}} * {{intitle|mirror}} {{disambiguation}}
